de.bioforscher.singa.simulation.modules.model

Class AbstractModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bioforscher.singa.simulation.modules.model.AbstractModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractNeighbourDependentModule, AbstractNeighbourIndependentModule, AbstractSectionSpecificModule

    public abstract class AbstractModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements Module

      The default value where deltas validated to be effectively zero.
      protected boolean halfTime
      If this flag is true, half time steps are calculated.
      protected LocalError largestLocalError
      The largest error that occurred while calculating the deltas for this module.
      protected Simulation simulation
      The simulation that the module is applied to.

        protected java.util.function.Predicate<AutomatonNode> conditionalApplication

      • onlyApplyIf

        public void onlyApplyIf(java.util.function.Predicate<AutomatonNode> predicate)
        The passed predicate is evaluated before applying the module to a node. If the predicate returns true the module is evaluated for the node.
        Parameters:
        predicate - The predicate to be evaluated.

      • getNumericalCutoff

        public double getNumericalCutoff()
        Return the numerical cutoff that is applied before adding any delta to the system. If the absolute delta value is smaller than the cutoff value its influence is assumed to be void (effectively zero).
        Returns:
        The numerical cutoff.

      • setNumericalCutoff

        public void setNumericalCutoff(double numericalCutoff)
        Sets the numerical cutoff that is applied before adding any delta to the system. If the absolute delta value is smaller than the cutoff value its influence is assumed to be void (effectively zero).
        Parameters:
        numericalCutoff - The numerical cutoff.
